level.heading: Collection and deposit of fees.
level.text: All fees collected by the Department under this subchapter shall be deposited with the D.C. treasurer and credited to the master business license fund as defined in § 47-2851.13.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title of title II of Law 12-261: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2855.01.
